job.description:
{"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-07-20T06:05:56.000Z", "description": "

SENIOR SOFTWARE ENGINEERs (RoR)

 

ZYMR Inc. has an immediate requirement to fulfill for our newest Customer. The project involves working with a fast-growing, tier-1, pre-IPO Silicon Valley Energy startup that was established almost 10 years ago and has raised more than $100M in funding so far.


We are looking for experienced Ruby on Rails (Preferred), Django Platform Developers:


Responsibilities and Duties

  • Write platform code, services, and components
  • Design & develop microservices for components
  • Responsible for design and implementation, test automation, and other SDLC activities.
  • Gather and analyze requirements and convert them into concrete technical tasks with effort estimates.
  • Cross-border project experience is a plus.
  • Perform code reviews, test case reviews to meet high-quality standards.

 

Qualifications and Skills

  • 6+ years building scalable applications with web frameworks like Ruby on Rails, Django, etc. (RoR preferred)
  • 6+ years experience with OOP design and building REST APIs
  • Proficient in designing microservices with containerization tools Docker and Kubernetes
  • Experience with UI frameworks like Angular or ReactJS
  • Strong background in Data Structures and Algorithms
  • Expert with Relational Databases, like MySQL or PostgreSQL
  • Experience with Web Services (REST)
  • Experience working in cloud environments, AWS preferred
  • Experience with SOA & Event-Driven Architecture.
  • Knowledge of Caching and Messaging technologies like Redis, RabbitMQ, Kafka.
  • Experience with Linux development and runtime environments
  • Experience with Agile / SCRUM methodology for product development (TDD, CI)
  • Education: Bachelor\u2019s in computer science or equivalent degree
  • 4+ years at any leading SaaS firm - experience with the energy domain a big plus.
